info.description: At MSS Cable Machinery, we offer a wide range of machines for cable manufacturing. Our products are designed to ensure the highest precision and efficiency, maximizing our customers' productivity. With our extensive experience and expertise, we develop tailored solutions that meet the specific needs of our clients.

productList.title: Rod Breakdown Line
productList.description: These machines are designed for the efficient breakdown of rods, ensuring uniform and precise processing.

productList.title: Insulation – Sheathing – Tandem Extrusion Lines
productList.description: Our extrusion lines provide reliable insulation and sheathing of cables to meet the highest quality standards.
productList.specs: Capacity up to 500 kg, processing speed up to 100 m/min.

productList.title: Stranding and Armoring Lines (Drum Twister)
productList.description: These machines enable precise stranding and armoring of cables while maintaining high production speed.
productList.specs: Stranding speed up to 200 m/min, armoring thickness up to 5 mm.

productList.title: Central Strander Machine (Bakır 07)
productList.description: A central stranding machine known for its reliability and precision, ensuring uniform stranding.
productList.specs: Stranding speed up to 180 m/min, maximum stranding capacity up to 1000 kg.

productList.title: Central Steel Wire Armoring Machine (Çelik 08)
productList.description: Specifically designed for the armoring of steel wires, offering a robust and durable solution.
productList.specs: Armoring speed up to 150 m/min, maximum armoring thickness up to 8 mm.

productList.title: Multi Central Stranding Line (MultiStrander 10)
productList.description: A versatile stranding machine that combines multiple stranding processes in a single line to maximize efficiency.
productList.specs: Stranding speed up to 250 m/min, maximum stranding capacity up to 1500 kg.

productList.title: Mica Taping Line
productList.description: These machines are designed for the precise taping of cables with mica tape to provide an additional layer of insulation.
productList.specs: Taping speed up to 120 m/min, maximum taping thickness up to 2 mm.

productList.title: Rewinding Line
productList.description: Ensures uniform and precise rewinding of cables to improve product quality.
productList.specs: Rewinding speed up to 100 m/min, maximum rewinding capacity up to 500 kg.

productList.title: Horizontal Taping Line
productList.description: Provides horizontal taping of cables for uniform and precise taping.
productList.specs: Taping speed up to 150 m/min, maximum taping thickness up to 3 mm.

productList.title: CV Line Machines
productList.description: Offers reliable and precise processing of cables to meet the highest quality standards.
productList.specs: Processing speed up to 200 m/min, maximum processing capacity up to 1000 kg.

info.description: At MSS Cable Machinery, we offer a wide range of services aimed at maximizing the efficiency and productivity of your cable manufacturing processes. Our experts are dedicated to ensuring that your machines are always in optimal condition and operating smoothly.

detail.title: Turnkey Cable Factories
detail.description: We provide complete solutions for the setup and commissioning of cable factories. From planning to final implementation, we handle all necessary steps to ensure your project's success.

detail.title: Cable Machine Production
detail.description: Our production lines include a variety of machines for cable manufacturing that meet the highest quality standards. We develop and manufacture machines tailored to our customers' specific requirements.

detail.title: Machine Installation
detail.description: Our expert team ensures the professional installation of your machines. We make sure all components are correctly installed and configured to guarantee a smooth startup.

detail.title: Modernization and Upgrading
detail.description: We offer services for modernizing and upgrading existing machines and equipment. By employing the latest technologies, we help you improve the performance and extend the lifespan of your machines.

detail.title: Technical Support and Service
detail.description: Our technical support is available around the clock. We provide quick and efficient solutions for any technical issues to minimize downtime and maximize productivity.

detail.title: Maintenance and HR Services
detail.description: Regular maintenance is crucial for the longevity and efficiency of your machines. Our maintenance team offers comprehensive services to ensure your machines are always in top condition. Additionally, we provide HR services to ensure your staff is well-trained and prepared to operate the machines.

items.title: Experience and Expertise
items.description: With years of experience in the industry, we have the necessary know-how to provide you with the best solutions.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We are constantly developing innovative solutions to meet the changing demands of the market.

items.title: Customer Satisfaction
items.description: Our top priority is to satisfy our customers by providing high-quality products and services.
